vulnerability.name: USN-4156-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4156-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in SDL. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that SDL incorrectly handled certain images. If a user  were tricked into opening a crafted image file, a remote attacker could  use this issue to cause SDL to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or  possibly execute arbitary code.

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in SDL. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
